Introductory speech at the conference-debate: "After the capitalist economy, the economy of sharing?" @mbauwens https://t.co/rwuqiZVkgE
"The collaborative economy has existed since lgtps, but it is now experiencing 1 major development due to technological developments" # ConfDébat
"As socialists, we see the potential offered by this economic model." # ConfDébat
"This collaborative economy carries the seeds of an alternative to the capitalist model." # ConfDébat
"The impact of the Internet on the economy but also on the organization of work and social relations is colossal." (1/2) # ConfDebate
"This impact needs to be thoroughly analyzed and integrated into all our reflections for a new social project." (2/2) # ConfDebate
"@mbauwens draws a historical parallel between the emergence of peer-to-peer and the socialism of the nineteenth-century working class." # ConfDébat
"@mbauwens even goes so far as to call for peer-to-peer socialism in the 21st century." # ConfDébat
